description: This file provides utility functions for creating modified copies of Note objects and lists of Notes, including updating the pinned status for multiple notes, replacing a note by its ID, and removing a note by ID.

classes.name: NoteCopyUtils
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods for manipulating lists of Note objects.

methods.name: updatePinnedBulk
methods.description: Updates the pinned status for all notes in the provided list whose IDs are in the given set.

methods.name: replaceOne
methods.description: Replaces a note in the list with an updated version based on matching ID.

methods.name: removeById
methods.description: Removes a note from the list by its ID.
